concept.title: 204.1670 Cross reference to Federal Procurement Data System.

conbody.p: Detailed guidance on mapping PIID and supplementary PIID numbers stored in the Electronic Data Access system to data elements reported in the Federal Procurement Data System can be found in PGI 204.1670.
